title: John Hancock Tower
summary: 200 Clarendon Street, previously John Hancock Tower[1] and colloquially known as The Hancock, is a 62-story, 790-foot (240Â m) skyscraper in the Back Bay neighborhood of Boston. The tower was designed by Henry N. Cobb of the firm I. M. Pei & Partners and was completed in 1976.[2]
